tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_usage FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    forecasted_energy_need FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE energy_costs (
    cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    electricity_cost FLOAT,
    gas_cost FLOAT,
    delivery_cost FLOAT,
    taxes_cost FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
   Date DATE,
   Time TIME,
   EnergyConsumed FLOAT,
   PRIMARY KEY (Date, Time)
)

CREATE TABLE BuildingInfo (
   BuildingID VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
   BuildingName VARCHAR(255),
   Address VARCHAR(255),
   ConstructionDate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyPredictions (
   Date DATE,
   Time TIME,
   EnergyForecast FLOAT,
   PRIMARY KEY (Date, Time)
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
   Date DATE,
   Temperature FLOAT,
   Humidity FLOAT,
   PRIMARY KEY (Date)
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyProviders (
   ProviderID VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
   ProviderName VARCHAR(255),
   ContactInfo VARCHAR(255),
   EstimatedCostPerUnit FLOAT
)
